# A

```{r}
file <- "https://github.com/datalorax/esvis/raw/master/data/benchmarks.rda"
load(url(file))
head(benchmarks)

benchmarks <- benchmarks %>%
	as_tibble() %>%
	mutate(wave = case_when(season == "Fall" ~ 0,
	                        season == "Winter" ~ 1,
	                        TRUE ~ 2))
```

# B

# 1

```{r}
sw_films %>% 
  str()

films <- 1:7
chars <- rep(NA, 7)

for(i in films){
  chars[i] <- as.list(sw_films[[i]]$characters) %>% 
    length()
}

titles <- rep(NA, 7)

for(i in films){
  titles[i] <- sw_films[[i]]$title
}

ans <- rep(NA, 7) %>% 
  as.list()

for(i in films){
  ans[i] <- paste0(titles[i], ": ", chars[i]) 
}

ans

```
